review: Expensive but good experience overall doctor was very nice, test and all are expensive but it's fine if you are fine.
He is friendly and spends time to understand patients conditions and prescribes accordingly. Good experience.

Didnt get any conclusion for the issue for which i visited.paid consultation fee of 750 , doctor said to visit neurologist . Instead of referring without any cost , i had to pay 1000 again for next doctor. No value
Charged higher fee than shown on Practo and the staff was also very rude with us regarding the same issue. They flat out said pay extra money or go away
